text: If it is the loop-back address we are trying to bind to, "InetAddress.getByName(null);" in ServerSocket constructor will do it for us in protocol independent way.

text:
InetAddress.getByName(null); might be more elegant but I believe the fix for the duplicate also addresses this. The fix is in 6.0.16 onwards.
